name: Language
description: Survival Limit +1. All survivors gain the Encourage survival action.

name: Paint
description: The settlement swells with creative energy. All survivors gain the Dash survival action.

name: Ammonia
description: A pungent, bilious substance ideal for crafting leather and treating wounds. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Symposium
description: Survival Limit +1. When a suirvivor innovates, draw an additional 2 innovation Cards to choose from.

name: Drums
description: (*) Bone Beats - roll 1d10. (1-4) Lone drummer. Gain +1 insanity. (5-8) Rythmic trance. Gain +1 survival. (9+) Remove one disorder from any survivor. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Inner Lantern
description: The settlement finds the light within. all survivors gain the Surge survival action. Surge: Once per round spend 1 survival to gain +1 (flash) and use it immediately. (See detailed rules in rulebook.)

name: Hovel
description: Survival Limit +1. The settlement accepts this nightmarish landscape as their home. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Bloodletting
description: (*) Breathing a Vein - spend 1 resource and roll 1d10. (1-3) Gain +1 understanding. Lose all survival. You cannot gain survival this settlement phase for any reason. (4-7) Syncope. Gain +3 insanity. (8+) Cured! Gain +6 insanity. You may remove one of the following: (-) 1 disorder of your choice. (-) Warped Pelvis severe waist injury. (-) Intestinal Prolapse severe waist injury.

name: Sacrification
description: (*) Initiation - Once per lifetime, gain +1 courage and roll the hit location die. (head) Suffer the blinded severe head injury. (body) Gain the Tough fighting art. (waist) Suffer destoryed genitals severe injury. (arms) Gambler's scar. Gain +1 permanent luck. (legs) Roll 1d10, on a result of 6+ you lose some toes, -1 permanent movement.

name: Shrine
description: May be used once per settlement phase. (*) Armor Ritual - roll 1d10. (1-3) Departing survivors gain +1 insanity. (4+) Final adjustments. Departing survivors add 1 (shield) to all hit locations.

name: Lantern Oven
description: Heat. By agitating lantern, a source of Heat becomes available to the settlement. Departing Survivors gain +1 survival.

name: Forbidden Dance
description: (*) Fever Dance - roll 1d10. (1) Clumsy. Suffer -1 permanent movement. (2-9) Give up. Gain +1 insanity. (10+) Forbidden Step. Spend 7 resources and gain +1 permanent evasion.

name: Saga
description: A telling of the settlement's survival, set to a soft rhythmic beating of drums. All newborn surivors gain +2 hunt experience and +2 survival from knowing the epic.

name: Song of the Brave
description: The survivors celebrate life by lifting their voices into the darkness. All non-deaf survivors add +1 t their roll results on the Overwhelming Darkness story event.

name: Heart Flute
description: May be used once per settlement phase. (*) Devil's Melody - roll 1d10. (1) Sharp note. The survivor drops dead. (2-5) Flat note. Add a Nemesis Encounter to the next timeline year. (6+) Select any Nemesis monster. Special encounter them now. You may choose their monster level. After the showdown, resume the settlement phase. Do not gain (*), draw a settlement event card, or advance a lantern year.

name: Pottery
description: Survival Limit +1. If the settlement loses all its resources, you may select up to two resources and keep them. (* Build) Barber Surgeon (3x organ) (1x scrap).

name: Pictograph
description: Crudely-drawn pictures guide the survivors' way home. Anytime during the hunt or showdown phase, a survivor may (book) Run Away.

name: Sculpture
description: Survival Limit +1. Silhouettes of sculptures cast strange, comforting shadows on the outskirts of your settlement. Departing survivors gain +2 survival when they depart for a Nemesis Encounter.

name: Face Painting
description: (*) Battle Paint - roll 1d10. (1-3) Laughing stock. Lose 1 survival. (4+) Death Ceremony. Gain +3 insanity. (*) Founder's Eye - roll 1d10. (1-3) An accidental mess. Nothing happens. (4+) Gain +1 to any rolls on the Intimacy story event this settlement phase.

name: Momento Mori
description: May be used once per settlement phase. (*) Nominate a survivor that died in the last showdown and roll 1d10. (1) Nothing happens. (2-3) Gain the insanity of the dead survivor. (4-8) Painful memories. Gain the courage and the understanding of the dead survivor. (9-10) Profound memories. Gain the hunt experience of the dead survivor.

name: Storytelling
description: Survival +1. (*)(*) Tale as Old as Time - roll 1d10. (1-3) Spend 3 resources, gain +1 understanding. (4-7) Gain +2 survival and +2 insanity. (8+) (book) White Speaker.

name: Nightmare Training
description: (*) Train - Lose 3 survival and roll 1d10. (1) Accident. Spend 1 survival or die. (2-7) You may spend 1 survival and roll again. (8-9) Gain +1 weapon proficiency level. (10+) Gain +1 permanent accuracy or strength.

name: Records
description: (*)(*) Knowledge - roll 1d10. (1) Move (swords) Nemesis Encounter - Watcher one year forward on the timeline. If the event is moved to this year, trigger it now. (2) Record-keeping duty. Skipt the next hunt. (3-5) You learn nothing. NOTHING! (6-9) Gain any fighting art a survivor currently has (does not include secret fighting arts). (10+) Set your hunt XP to 0. You may gain the benefits of the Age story event again.

name: Sacrifice
description: (*) Death Ritual - roll 1d10. (1) Pointless deahts. -2 population. (2-3) Screamer. -1 population. Departing survivors gain +3 insanity. (4-5) Inhuman. -1 population. Departing survivors lose all insanity. (6+) Move (swords) Nemesis encounter - Watcher one year back on the timeline. -1 population. May be gained once per settlement phase.

name: Family
description: Departing Survivors gain +1 survival. Survivors nominated for Intimacy may give themselves a surname if they do not have one. A newborn survivor inherits the surname of one parent, their weapon type and half (rounded down) of their weapon proficiency levels.

name: Bed
description: Survival Limit +1. (*) Rest - roll 1d10. (1-3) Nightmares. Gain +1 insanity. (4+) You cannot endeavor again this settlement phase. Skip the next hunt. You may remove one of the following: (-) All Broken Arm sever injuries. (-) All Broken Hip severe injuries. (-) All Broken Rib severe injuries. (-) Ruptured Muscle severe injury.

name: Clan of Death
description: The enduring strength of your clan passes through generations. All newborn survivors gain: +1 Accuracy. +1 Strenght. +1 Evasion.

name: Partnership
description: (*)(*): Nominate two survivors. They pair off, and each gains the Partner ability. A survivor may be nominated for Partnership once per lifetime. Partner - "(Partner's' Name)": When you both depart, gain +2 survival. While adjacent to your partner, gain +1 strength. Parnters may only nominate each other for (book) Intimacy. When a partner dies, the remaining partner gains a random disorder and loses this ability.

name: Cooking
description: Survival Limit +1. (*) Culinary Inspiration - roll 1d10. (1-2) Uninspired. (3+) (book) Cooking.

name: Scrap Smelting
description: (*) Purification - Roll 1d10. (1-2) Nothing happens. (3-9) Spend 3 scrap and add 1 Iron to storage. (10+) Spend 3 scrap and add 1 Iron to storage. You may repeat this any number of times. (* Build) Blacksmith (6x bone) (3x scrap).

name: Ultimate Weapon
description: Survival Limit +1. When you defeat a monster, gain 1 monster resource of your choice from its resource deck.

name: Final Fighting Art
description: Survival Limit +1. Once per showdown, you may select a card from the discard pile or wound stack and place it on top of the AI deck.

name: Guidepost
description: The soft glow of its light fills the survivors with a sense of security. Departing survivors gain +1 survival. (*): The survivor attempts to pull the weapon free from the ground. Roll 1d10 and add their strength. If the result ist 12+, gain the Lantern Halberd rare gear and lose this innovation (archive this card).
